<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition table="x_58872_needit_mainmain">u_related_groupLIKE^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_related_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>Allow read for records in x_58872_needit_mainmain, for users with role x_58872_needit.mainmain_user, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>x_58872_needit_mainmain</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = (gs.getUserName() == current.sys_created_by) ;
// // var resultabc;

var grmember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
grmember.addQuery('user',gs.getUserID());
grmember.query();
while(grmember.next()){
	var result = current.u_related_group.includes(grmember.group);
	
// 	answer = (gs.getUserName() == current.sys_created_by) ;
}

// // answer = resultabc;]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-15 03:51:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>5c582cb32fa10110575b265df699b670</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_58872_needit_mainmain</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_5c582cb32fa10110575b265df699b670</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-15 05:39:30</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
